item.description:
Maybe you’ve been thinking about starting a meditation practice but keep putting it off. Maybe it’s time to finally overcome that resistance and start enjoying the peace offered by turning within through meditation. Or perhaps you are already meditating but could use a refresher or some inspiration to strengthen your practice. In this class you will learn a simple, effective meditation technique as well as the fundamentals to get you started in this wonderful spiritual practice.
No special postures; no special clothes; and it’s always free!

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: De-stress through Meditation
